channel.title: Your awesome title
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: CWS-Intercept Page Component
item.description:
Serving Territory Intercept Page

Your address: ${ADDRESS 1} ${ADDRESS 2}, ${CITY}, ${STATE} is in another TDS service area.

Please visit TDSTelecom.com $screenReaderTextOption to shop for products and services.

Edit Address to continue shopping for TDS Cable products and services.

$btnCTA $screenReaderTextOption

You are currently a TDS Telecom customer.

Please visit TDSTelecom.com $screenReaderTextOption to shop for products and services.

Log out to continue shopping for TDS Cable products and services.

$btnCTA $screenReaderTextOption

Your address: ${ADDRESS 1} ${ADDRESS 2}, ${CITY}, ${STATE} is in another TDS service area.

Please visit bendbroadband.com $screenReaderTextOption to shop for products and services.

Edit Address to continue shopping for TDS Cable products and services.

$btnCTA $screenReaderTextOption

You are currently a BendBroadband customer.

Please visit bendbroadband.com $screenReaderTextOption to shop for products and services.

Log out to continue shopping for TDS Cable products and services.

$btnCTA $screenReaderTextOption

item.title: CWS-Address Entry Component
item.description:
Address Entry

It looks like you have items in your shopping cart. Changing your address will empty the cart since availability and prices can vary by location.

Please log out if youâ€™d like to shop for products and services at a different address.

To see available products, pricing, and special offers, please provide your address

Please remove any punctuation (Example: St not St.)
Please remove any punctuation (Example: St Marys not St. Marys)
Looking for Business Services? Visit www.tdsbusiness.com.

We respect your privacy. The information you provide will only be used to retrieve the products and services at your address.

Already a TDS Customer? Log In

Verify Address

Address (edit)

109 MAIN ST

VERONA, WI

Are you sure that's the right address? We couldn't find a match but did find similar addresses. Tell us which address you'd like us to use:

Existing Service at this Address

Address (edit)

109 MAIN ST

VERONA, WI

I am already a TDS Customer

Log In

I am moving to this address

$buttonCTA

We're sorry, but your address was not found in our systems. We cannot offer you any products at this time. If you have questions about TDS service, please call.

Address not Found

You entered:

109 MAIN ST

VERONA, WI

Edit this address

item.title: CWS-ViewCart FinalCart Review Component
item.description:
View Cart/Final Cart Review

In order to proceed, please fix the following item(s):

  • Error message one
  • Error message two

Package Name

Edit

Internet Services

1 Gig Fiber Internet $xx.xx/mo for xx months
4-port Wireless V1000H Gateway Modem $4.95/mo
Remote PC Support $0.00/mo
TDS Internet Security FREE for 30 Days

TV Services

Basic $xx.xx/mo for xx months
High Definition Upgrade $XX.XX/mo
Connected Home DVR $4.95/mo
Wireless Set Top Box (Qty: 2) $XX.XX/mo
HBO FREE for 30 Days
Professional Installation $XX.XX one-time fee

Phone Services

1 Gig Fiber Internet $xx.xx/mo for xx months
4-port Wireless V1000H Gateway Modem $4.95/mo
Remote PC Support $0.00/mo
TDS Internet Security FREE for 30 Days

Package Name

Edit
3 Star Voice Package: Add On $xx.xx/mo
Local Service: Additional Features $xx.xx/mo

Estimated Taxes & Fees

3-Star Taxes and Fees $8.86/mo
Professional Installation Fee $49.95 one-time fee

Order Total

One-time costs $49.95
One-time credits ($49.95)
MONTHLY CHARGES $176.07

item.title: CWS-User Greeting
item.description:
Address: ${ADDRESS 1} ${ADDRESS 2}, ${CITY}, ${STATE}. Edit address

The address you entered is in the BendBroadband serving territory. Please visit https://www.bendbroadband.com to find available products and services.

The address you entered is in the TDS Telecom serving territory. Please visit https://www.tdstelecom.com to find available products and services.

You're logged in as ${USERNAME}. Log Out.
